author: hollowstrawberry
description: Live player interface for the audio cog. Updates every 10 seconds or whenever the song changes or you press a button. Stays at the bottom of chat.
install_msg:
ðŸŽ¶ __**AudioPlayer**__
:warning: **Important:** Discord doesn't like when things update periodically without human input, even when it follows ratelimits, so use this at your own risk. ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load audioplayer
2. Enable in a server with [p]audioplayer channel [channel]```
short: Live player interface for the audio cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
